resources.string: It is a main menu. Hovering it will bring three sub menus. The sub menu includes AR, Game, Sensor page. AR menu is on the top, Game menu is on the bottom right, Sensor menu is on the bottom left from the main menu
Would you like to try \'Tilt the phone\'? \nLet\'s see what is changing :D
It is a 2D image scroll view on the top of page. Now you are pointing a circle 2D image in a scroll
It is a diamond 2D image in a scroll view
It is a heat 2D image in a scroll view
It is a hexagon 2D image in a scroll view
It is a octagon 2D image in a scroll view
It is a oval 2D image in a scroll view
It is a rectangle 2D image in a scroll view
It is a square 2D image in a scroll view
It is a star 2D image in a scroll view
It is a triangle 2D image in a scroll view
